titleStmt.title: An entry from the Journals of Hensley Henson

sourceDesc.bibl: Edited from the manuscripts in the custody of Durham Cathedral Library.

body.p: I celebrated in the Abbey at 8 a.m.: attended the consecration of the Bishop of Uganda at 10.30 a.m.: baptized Roderick Ian Alexander–Sinclair at 2 p.m.: attended the Bunyan Memorial Window service at 3 p.m.: instructed Clarence Tait for Confirmation at 5 p.m.
